nodes.text: Star Wars: Clone Wars is a PhotoComic adaptation of the Star Wars: Clone Wars animated television series. It was released on May 21, 2008 and adapted the complete first season of the series alongside episode one of Season Two.

In the epic struggle for control of the galaxy, the Republic's clone trooper armies wage war with the droid legions of the Confederation. With the evil Count Dooku leading Separatist forces, it falls to Jedi such as Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker, and even Master Yoda to lead the Republic to victory!
Using images taken directly from the Emmy Award-winning animated series, this pocket-sized volume presents those action-packed Cartoon Network episodes in a whole new way!
